socialDispositions.label: Engage
socialDispositions.description: You throw yourself into social interactions—boldly starting conversations, forging connections, and using charm or persuasion to shape events.

socialDispositions.label: Disengage
socialDispositions.description: You hang back and manipulate from the shadows—preferring subtlety, misdirection, or quiet influence over direct confrontation.

socialDispositions.label: Remain
socialDispositions.description: You stay calm and observant—listening more than speaking, weighing all angles, and intervening only when absolutely necessary.
